contents.text: Advanced Keep Inventory is an expansion for the vanilla game rule and recommended for the Scale Leveling experience.
This new advanced game rule adds a new feature to the existing rule that makes players lose all of their experience on death.

body.contents: "Difficulty++" menu lets you select game difficulties beyond vanilla. When a difficulty is selected it changes it for all players.
All of the new difficulties will change the Ender Dragon boss fight.
Expert: Minimum to activate the enhanced Ender Dragon. Enemies hit hard. Recommended for the Scale Leveling experience.
Veteran: For those who know everything about this game. Enemies hit very hard.
Divinity: The highest difficulty. For those who seek a supreme challenge.
Chronos: Gimmick difficulty. You kill and die instantly. The only one who can resist your damage is the Ender Dragon.
Challenges are a way to earn extra scale points. They usually require a much harder difficulty which can be selected from the "Difficulty++" menu.
